mapper.select: select rnum, reviewNo, memberId, reserveNO, reviewTitle, reviewContent, reviewDate, reviewPoint, campNo from (select rownum as rnum, r.* from (select review_no as reviewNo, member_id as memberId, reserve_no as reserveNo, review_title as reviewTitle, review_content as reviewContent, review_date as reviewDate, review_point as reviewPoint, camp_no as campNo from review order by 1 desc) r) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) as cnt from review
